turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I need to check my bank account balance. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To proceed, I need you to verify your identity. Please enter your account number and password.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I've done that. But now I'm looking at my transaction history, and there's a charge I don't recognize. What is it?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I cannot directly identify the nature of the transaction. For security reasons, this requires human intervention. Please contact our customer support at 555-1212. They will be able to look into it further and provide detailed information.

turns.speaker: user
